short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A versatile wallet for gamers & non-web3 users

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Walless: Your Wallet-less Wallet for Web3

Introducing Walless, the revolutionary Web3 sandbox-wallet that transforms the decentralized world's user experience and brand engagement. 

With Walless, we make your Web3 life dead-simple, seamless and personalized. We believe everyone has their own way to use wallet and so we allow you to tailor the wallet to your likings. Each interaction you make is switching seamlessly between your favorite project widgets/dApps without knowing which networks they are on. With a Discord-style layout style, you can now experience a distinct brand experience with each interaction inside Walless.

Main Features:
- 1-click onboarding with passwordless and social authentication
- Self-custodial
- MPC-based threshold signature technology
- Automated wallet creation across supported chains
- Multi-chain support, including Solana, Sui, Tezos, and more EVM and non-EVM networks
- Access 10k+ tokens effortlessly
- NFT, xNFT
- Send, swap, and buy crypto with fiat
- Notifications
- Discover Widget Explorer with native in-wallet dApps for an immersive journey
- Seamlessly switching dApps across different networks
- Permissionless content generated: anyone can create their own widget to Walless with our no-code design tool
- Embeed any Web3 and Web2 app, run natively inside Walless

Experience Walless today to create your own Web3 lifestyle today!

We’re in Private Beta testing with limited seats available so Invitation code is needed to use Walless. If you don’t have your code, kindly visit our Twitter or Discord for a code. 

Useful links:
- https://walless.io
- https://twitter.com/walless_wallet
- https://discord.gg/kCBUHFZVVY
